Starting Detection

Starting Detection

  1. Select Start in the Detection menu

  1. The detection section is now activated
  2. Select the Detection Radiobutton.
  3. Choose an event from the MAIN-CLASS
  4. Choose an event from the SUB-CLASS

  1. Mark the starting point of the event with the left mouse button

  1. Mark the ending point of the event with the left mouse button

  1. To change the starting or the ending point of the event, keep the right mouse button pressed and move the current line (start-/endline of the event) to a new position.

  1. If you click with the right mouse button to the event its name is indicated.

  1. In the listbox TAKING OVER DETECTION the last executed detection can be taken over to further selected channels

 

  1. To delete an event keep the SHIFT-Button pressed  and select the event with the left mouse button

 

Display Detection

  1. Select the Display Radiobutton
  2. Choose an event from the MAIN-CLASS
  3. Choose one or more events from the SUB-CLASS

Here it's not possible to execute a detection, but you can edit available events.

 

Save Detection

  1. Select Stop/Save Detection in the Detection menu

  1. Press the Yes Button

  1. Then press the Save Button
